Why can't you boot from cd? Is it enabled as the 1st boot option in bios?
Try f9 or f12, sometimes those give you the option to boot from cd.
Is this a laptop or a desktop? What is your motherboard manufacturer and model?
It should be the f2 key, I'd suggest turning the laptop off, then turn it on and as soon as you hit the power button, hit f2 as fast as you can but be sure to release in between taps.
Can you disable booting to the hdd?
Its possible, it will tell you on the tray.
